name: Faulty Apprentice: Escape from Borg Mountain
summary: Join Durandall and the Stars Reach Instructors on an adventure to the most perilous, pointiest, and prickliest peek that's ever protruded into the cumulous, Borg Mountain! Will you and your friends be able to unravel the mountain's secrets and unlock the hidden treasure within? (FREE title update)
